mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_ID as productId, PRODUCT_NAME as productName, PRODUCT_PRICE as productPrice, PRODUCT_STOCK as productStock, PRODUCT_STATUS as productStatus, PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION as productDescription, FIRST_INPUT_DTTM as firstInputDttm, FIRST_INPUT_ID as firstInputId, LAST_INPUT_DTTM as lastInputDttm, LAST_INPUT_ID as lastInputId FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY PRODUCT_ID
